title: Purpose-Driven Blended Science Instructional Design Process

context.prior_knowledge: Basic comprehension of science concepts (beginner level)
context.additional_context: Blended science lesson design competency enhancement program for current elementary school teachers. Flexible learning environments utilizing digital devices and mobile platforms

learning_goals: Learners can create a blended science curriculum design plan considering diverse learning styles with at least 80% completeness.
Learners can develop at least three purpose-driven science education activities combining mobile platforms and face-to-face interactions.
Learners can analyze technology integration strategies based on learner characteristics and apply them to project-based assessments.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
